description: This file defines API functions for managing device data, including listing, retrieving, creating, updating, deleting, and pinging devices. It supports both mock data and real backend requests, with helper functions for data normalization and mapping.

methods.name: normalizeServerPagination
methods.description: Converts server response to a normalized pagination shape, handling both paginated and full array responses.

methods.name: listDevices
methods.description: Fetches a list of devices, supporting pagination if backend supports it, or returns full list with client-side pagination fallback.

methods.name: getDevice
methods.description: Retrieves a single device by ID, either from mock data or via backend request.

methods.name: createDevice
methods.description: Creates a new device, with mock support for uniqueness constraints.

methods.name: updateDevice
methods.description: Updates an existing device by ID, with mock support for conflict detection.

methods.name: deleteDevice
methods.description: Deletes a device by ID, either from mock data or via backend request.

methods.name: pingDevice
methods.description: Triggers a status refresh (ping) for a device, toggling its online/offline status in mock mode or via backend.
